        <h2>what is KIF?</h2>
        <p><strong>KIF (Kissan Finder)</strong> is a highly secure and trusted platform where any farmer can register for free. after registration, the KIF team completes verification. once verified, the farmer receives a <strong>login and password</strong> and a <strong>permanent KIF qr code</strong>.</p>

        <p>when someone scans this permanent qr code, they can view the farmer‚Äôs verified profile: contact details, photos of the farm, cultivation practices, certifications, and more. for every batch of produce sold, the farmer can easily add batch-specific details (harvest date, variety, inputs used, location, quantity, etc.) so buyers can trace each batch to its origin.</p>

        <div class="fig-callout" role="note">
          <strong>permanent qr code usage:</strong> the same qr can be <u>printed on product labels</u>, <u>shared digitally</u>, or <u>displayed in shops and markets</u>. it always points to the farmer‚Äôs KIF profile and the latest batch records.
        </div>

        <h3>why use KIF?</h3>
        <ul class="fig-benefits">
          <li><strong>free, verified identity:</strong> farmers join at no cost; profiles are verified by the KIF team to build trust.</li>
          <li><strong>one qr for life:</strong> a permanent code that‚Äôs easy to print on labels, packs, or display boards.</li>
          <li><strong>batch-level traceability:</strong> record details for each batch in minutes; buyers can see what they are purchasing.</li>
          <li><strong>market visibility:</strong> a clean public profile with photos, practices, and certifications boosts reach and credibility.</li>
          <li><strong>consumer confidence:</strong> scanning reveals authentic, up-to-date data from KIF‚Äôs secure database.</li>
          <li><strong>fair trade and branding:</strong> transparent origin stories help justify price and build loyal customers.</li>
          <li><strong>organization ready:</strong> cooperatives, fpos, and ngos can manage and showcase networks of verified farmers.</li>
          <li><strong>security and control:</strong> login-based updates; farmers control what they publish while KIF safeguards data.</li>
        </ul>
      </article>

  #fig-concept[data-lang="en"] .lang-ml { display: none;  }

<script>
  (function () {
    const root = document.getElementById('fig-concept');
    const saved = localStorage.getItem('fig_lang_concept');
    if (saved === 'en' || saved === 'ml') root.setAttribute('data-lang', saved);

    function syncButtons(lang) {
      document.querySelectorAll('#fig-concept .lang-btn').forEach(b => {
        const on = b.getAttribute('data-set-lang') === lang;
        b.classList.toggle('active', on);
        b.setAttribute('aria-selected', on ? 'true' : 'false');
      });
    }
    syncButtons(root.getAttribute('data-lang'));

    document.querySelectorAll('#fig-concept .lang-btn').forEach(btn => {
      btn.addEventListener('click', () => {
        const lang = btn.getAttribute('data-set-lang');
        root.setAttribute('data-lang', lang);
        localStorage.setItem('fig_lang_concept', lang);
        syncButtons(lang);
      });
    });
  })();
</script>
